Serotonin.description: A neurotransmitter involved in various bodily functions

Mood.description: Emotional state influenced by serotonin levels

Sleep.description: Serotonin regulates sleep cycles and quality

Anxiety.description: Elevated anxiety linked to low serotonin

Depression.description: Low serotonin implicated in depressive disorders

REM Sleep.description: Rapid eye movement sleep phase influenced by serotonin

Sleep Quality.description: Poor sleep quality associated with serotonin imbalances

Panic Attacks.description: Physical symptoms of panic attacks linked to serotonin

Generalized Anxiety.description: Chronic worry and restlessness linked to serotonin deficiency

Major Depressive Disorder.description: A severe mood disorder often treated with serotonin reuptake inhibitors

Persistent Depressive Disorder.description: Chronic low mood and fatigue associated with serotonin dysfunction

Daytime Fatigue.description: Fatigue during the day due to poor sleep

Cognitive Function.description: Cognitive functions impacted by sleep quality and serotonin levels

Increased Heart Rate.description: A physical symptom of panic attacks

Shortness of Breath.description: A physical symptom of panic attacks

Loss of Interest.description: A symptom of major depressive disorder

Suicidal Ideation.description: A symptom of major depressive disorder

Low Mood.description: A symptom of persistent depressive disorder

Fatigue.description: A symptom of persistent depressive disorder

Sleep Paralysis.description: Temporary inability to move during sleep
